nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 104: When Strike the Stormtroopers! is the one hundred fourth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes The Weapons Master!, the first blac & white part of the story The Weapons Master!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. It wasn't until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic shows its original non-color style.

The comic also includes the fourth part of a brand-new section called Star Profile featuring Harrison Ford alongside a study-interview of his carrer until 1979 including the soon to-be-released Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
